abstract: Police add six attacks in subway stations to a pattern of sexual assaults that have badly shaken several neighborhoods in South Brooklyn, bringing the total number of cases in that area up to 20 since March.
snippet: The attacks have occurred in areas like Bay Ridge, Sunset Park and Park Slope and involved the groping and grabbing of young women near transportation hubs.
lead_paragraph: The attacks have occurred in areas like Bay Ridge, Sunset Park and Park Slope and involved the groping and grabbing of young women near transportation hubs.

headline.main: 6 Attacks Linked to Pattern in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: 6 Attacks Linked to Pattern in Brooklyn
headline.seo: 6 Attacks Linked to Pattern of Assaults in Brooklyn
